vote.title: Authorize acquisition from James Reed, of approximately 1,757 square feet of land located in Hunt County for the Lake Tawakoni 144-inch Transmission Pipeline Project - Not to exceed $3,629.00 ($629.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,000.00) - Financing: Water Construction Fund
